bibl.title: Notes on Various Texts Preserved on Papyrus.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: 1. P. Oxy. LXXIII, 4939 (= M.-P.3 1984.24; LDAB 117819), ii, 19-20. - 2. P. Oxy. LXXIII, 4943 (= M.-P.3 337.11; LDAB 117822), 4-9. - 3. P. Köln VI, 245 (= M.-P.3 1965.41; LDAB 5291), 32-33. - 4. New edition of P. Berol. Inv. 11520 ↓ (= LDAB 10976): A Collection of Aesop's Fables [previously edited as ""a narrative with magical content""]. Unknown provenance, third century CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
